container.heading: Notice of Amount of Renewal and Expiring Policy Premiums

section.heading: Purpose.
section.text: The purpose of this chapter is to ensure that an insurer properly notifies the named insured and insurance producer of the amount of a policy’s renewal and expiring premiums in accordance with Insurance Article, §27-607, Annotated Code of Maryland.

section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: This chapter applies to all policies of personal insurance and insurance issued under the Maryland Property Insurance Availability Act or any similar act instituted to ensure the availability of property insurance.

para.text: In this chapter the following terms have the meanings indicated.
The dollar amount of the premium charged at the beginning of the expiring policy term; and
If different, the dollar amount of the premium:
Charged at the time the insurer issues the notice required by Regulation .04 of this chapter; and

“Insurer” means an authorized property or casualty insurer that issues or delivers a policy of personal insurance in the State or a policy issued under the Maryland Property Insurance Availability Act or any similar act instituted to ensure the availability of property insurance.
“Maryland Property Insurance Availability Act” means insurance described in Insurance Article, Title 25, Subtitle 4, Annotated Code of Maryland.
“Personal insurance” means a policy of property insurance or casualty insurance as defined by Insurance Article, §27-601(c), Annotated Code of Maryland.
“Renewal premium” means the dollar amount of the premium to be charged for the next policy term.
At least 45 days prior to the renewal date of a policy subject to this chapter, an insurer shall send written notice to the named insured and the insurance producer of the policy.
The notice required under §A of this regulation:
Shall state the dollar amount or amounts of the policy’s expiring premium;
Shall state the dollar amount of the policy’s renewal premium;
Shall be sent either by first class mail or delivered by electronic means pursuant to the requirements of Insurance Article, §27-601.2, Annotated Code of Maryland; and
May be sent together with the renewal policy and may be included on the declarations page of the renewal policy.

section.heading: Penalties.
section.text: Penalties for violations of these regulations shall be assessed in accordance with Insurance Article, §§4-113 and 27-612, Annotated Code of Maryland.
